plot: Sergio Martino takes viewers through the art, design and even clichés of the Italian giallo film genre, discussing what makes it aesthetically unique. Produced for the Arrow Video UK BluRay release of Dario Argento's Cat o' Nine Tails.
title: Sergio Martino: The Art and Arteries of the Giallo
plot_es: Sergio Martino takes viewers through the art, design and even clichés of the Italian giallo film genre, discussing what makes it aesthetically unique. Produced for the Arrow Video UK BluRay release of Dario Argento's Cat o' Nine Tails.
original_name: Sergio Martino: The Art and Arteries of the Giallo
plot_en: Sergio Martino takes viewers through the art, design and even clichés of the Italian giallo film genre, discussing what makes it aesthetically unique. Produced for the Arrow Video UK BluRay release of Dario Argento's Cat o' Nine Tails.
